data.text:
@JohnBoozman Appeasement kills. If Trump and the US legitimize the Islamic regime, they become partners in the mass murder of Iranians. Silence and deals cost lives.
#IranMassacre #IranGenocide #KingRezaPahlavi #R2PforIran #shutdownislamiccenter

@JohnBoozman Senator, this is bigger than nukes.
Over 40,000 Iranians have been massacred for demanding freedom.
Do not let these negotiations go anywhere.
Any deal gives this bloodthirsty regime time to regroup, rearm, and once again become a threat to the world.

Iranians did not rise up to https://t.co/OKXIEPJhjC

@JohnBoozman We won’t forget in 28. You barely made it this time and only did because you’re not to vote for anything with the Ds unacceptable. We already have a search team out for candidates to run against you.
@JohnBoozman Please don’t negotiate with Iran’s brutal regime. The Iranian people need the support of their long-time friends.
@JohnBoozman If Boozman is congratulating someone I automatically assume that person is a foreign agent attempting to destroy America, like Boozman https://t.co/2F36IKz1u7

@JohnBoozman Please do not negotiate with a government that kills its own people.
We need your support to help save the lives of Iran’s young generation.

@JohnBoozman Thats great 👍, 
Now start saying yes to the save act!
